title: I Save Money
subtle: Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 31 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: I Save Money allows students to explore the concept of saving money. Students will be introduced to the different types of coins and bills through detailed photographs. The students will also have the opportunity to locate details that support the main idea of the book. Repetitive phrases support early readers.
reviewWords: dime, dollar(s), nickel, penny, quarter, save
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
wordWork: High-Frequency Words                : Recognize and use high-frequency word I
